TopicTitle: Ariane 5 and other Projects under development

Articles.Content: I think not much, 1742 polygons.
I\'ve got a feeling I\'m using to little amount of polygons hehe.

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I think on your sattelite it doesn\'t care, It\'s quite small object and only a payload with not much parts, also, it makes your sat more nice, I like your job. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Try to start with adding less verticles on the cylinders.

Maybe it would be one of first payloads what I will want on my orbit. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Can I have an order for you please? I modelled solar panel, but I need to animate it and I can\'t. You know about what I\'m talking. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Which 3d package are you using? A possibility that you can use in the future my solar panels?
I\'m using blender. And yes, maybe I can use your solar panels on the ATV, but they will need to edit a bit.

> 
> I\'m using blender. And yes, maybe I can use your solar panels on the ATV, but they will need to edit a bit.

Ones we both finished (and probably release it during 1.6) then we can take a proper look at it.
Ok.

I edited the poll. You can vote again, now you will vote for your favourite type of Energia rocket.

Pic\'s: ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Vulkan:

> ![vulkan.jpg](http://www.buran.fr/energia/img/vulkan.jpg)

Energia- Buran:

> ![energia1.jpg](http://www.celestialmatters.org/users/monalisa/images/energia1.jpg)

Uragan:

> ![Uragan1m.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/11/Uragan1m.jpg)

Energia- M:

> ![ener-m.gif](http://www.buran.fr/energia/img/ener-m.gif)

My favourite Energia is Vulkan, of course. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Which one has the most cargo capacity?
It is in the poll, in the '(.........)'. The Vulkan.
An educated guess, the Energia- XS Surprise consists of the energia and six liquid fuel boosters?
That\'s surprise. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Uragan (Energia II) is very interesting, but cargo system (attach pic) is is probably too complicated for KSP.

P.S. Yay.. first post...

> 
> Uragan (Energia II) is very interesting, but cargo system (attach pic) is is probably too complicated for KSP.

Not at all. Anything I can see on that pic has been already done. Uragan whould be the most interesting one I think.

Unfortunately in this topic is only seven people who appreciate this approach and unfortunately, probably will win the vulcan (next to big and difficult to full use rocket ....) ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Hi, I have (hopefully) good news from the project. I\'m quite late, sorry, but I didn\'t have internet connection last week.

So, I had a lot of fun with shadows and texturing, results are quite suprisingly:

Make that eight. This approach would certainly be the most interesting (and probably the most difficult to fly).

In practice it probably would be very (/too) expensive to operate in comparison to non-reusable rockets.

Hi,

After some troubles, I have first final part for you. It\'s SRB. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

You can download it here: [http://www./?vu9x69g04g7bxe7](http://www./?vu9x69g04g7bxe7)

Archive includes three parts:

*Ariane-SRB*  - First cfg version

*Ariane-SRB-v2* - Better and maybe fina cfg version

*Ariane-SRB-v3* - Version for testing

Feedbacks are welcome, enjoy first part.
Also, raise the Anti-Aliasing settings to 2x or more for better visual style of srb.

Nice. So i tested the SRB on my version of the Ariane 5 ECA and the v2 is the best but i modified it a little bit. CFG attached to this Post if you are interested.

> ![rmadybr88n.jpg](http://www7.pic-upload.de/15.07.12/rmadybr88n.jpg)

@AveXx Thanks, I have to look at, but anyway, nice replica of Ariane 5 ECA, Have you got also Ariane 5 Evolution?

I had a fun with cycles and modelling, so now we have 2nd stage:

![ariane5expcyc.png](http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/6687/ariane5expcyc.png)

From left: Fairings, ASAS, Fuel, Liquid Engine with vernier, Interstage, Core stage, Boosters.

You mean the Ariane 5 ME (Midlife Evolution) or witch one ? I also build the Ariane 5 ES (with ATV) but well i have to work on the ATV.

Ohhh and now the Flames of the SRB comming out of the nossel not out of the bosters frame =D
